document.write('<link rel="stylesheet" href="http://gist.github.com/stylesheets/gist/embed.css"/>')





document.write('<div id=\"gist-318975\" class=\"gist\">\n  \n  \n    \n            \n            \n            \n\n      <div class=\"gist-file\">\n        <div class=\"gist-data gist-syntax\">\n          \n          \n          \n            <div class=\"gist-highlight\"><pre><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC1\">...<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC2\">dir = /home/xen<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC3\">...<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC4\">debootstrap = 1<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC5\">...<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC6\">dist = etch<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC7\">#If you want to give your domains static IP&#39;s rather than use DHCP (which I did then you can setup the default gateway/netmask)<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC8\">gateway = 192.168.1.1<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC9\">netmask = 255.255.255.0<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC10\">...<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC11\">#This bit is important, as mine differed to the default you need to change kernel and initrd to point to the right ones (ls /boot/* - to find out)<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC12\">kernel = /boot/vmlinuz-2.6.18-6-xen-amd64<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC13\">initrd = /boot/initrd.img-2.6.18-6-xen-amd64<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC14\">...<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC15\">#Change this to your prefered mirror (for me that&#39;s the UK):<\/div><div class=\"line\" id=\"LC16\">mirror = http://ftp.uk.debian.org/debian/<\/div><\/pre><\/div>\n          \n        <\/div>\n\n        <div class=\"gist-meta\">\n          <a href=\"http://gist.github.com/raw/318975/0ff6756b696554c9923a8fab90279fc548f121d4/gistfile3.txt\" style=\"float:right;\">view raw<\/a>\n          <a href=\"http://gist.github.com/318975#file_gistfile3.txt\" style=\"float:right;margin-right:10px;color:#666\">gistfile3.txt<\/a>\n          <a href=\"http://gist.github.com/318975\">This Gist<\/a> brought to you by <a href=\"http://github.com\">GitHub<\/a>.\n        <\/div>\n      <\/div>\n    \n            \n  \n<\/div>\n')
